description.value: Your attacks are deadly, silent, and nearly untraceable. The first time each round that you attempt to Strike a target you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unnoticed] by while using a weapon you have familiarity with from this archetype, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] from the target after the attack, as they cannot tell where the attack came from.
